comments:
I just got the following NPE while merging. Eclipse.org was slow at the time so
the cause may be related to a timeout. 

As a side note, there was no feedback in the wizard that the operation failed.
Also, the merge should spawn a job instead of blocking the user.

Fix released to HEAD. The TeamProvider.deregister was firing an event even if 
the subscriber was not registered.
